aka: 大衛艾登堡：地球上的一段生命旅程(港)
this_title: David Attenborough: A Life on Earth
trans_title: 大衛艾登堡：地球上的一段生命旅程(港)
introduction: For more than six decades now, Sir David Attenborough has been the voice of modern natural history programs and has inspired millions by bringing the natural world into our homes, teaching them about the diverse lifestyles, behaviours and adaptations of living things. His incredible journey and illustrious career have made him an inspiration to millions.
chinese_title: David Attenborough: A Life on Earth
